Build home page

First looks for README.md, then index.md. If neither is found, falls back to the description field in DESCRIPTION.

build_home(pkg = ".", path = NULL)

Arguments

pkg
Path to source package.
path
Output path.

YAML config

There are currently no options to control the appearance of the homepage.

Built by staticdocs. Styled with Bootstrap 3.
